name: Chicken Loop
description:
Chicken Loop was made for Brackeys game jam 2020.2!

This game is about the journey of a weird chicken. Embark in a quest to find out if the chick came before the egg, mysteries and puzzles await your wandering. Will you manage to solve the riddle of time? Where did these powers come from?

We hope you enjoy yourselves while playing our game, for any feedback don't hesitate to send us a message or leave a comment, thanks for playing!

 ~~~ 

Chicken Loop is puzzle game involving time manipulation.
